name: Hunger Of The Elder Slime
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 49, whose theme was "Unstable"!

Hunger of the Elder Slime is a tower defense / mine sweeper game where you must protect your sugary village from invading slimes. But placing towers angers the elder slime, and when he wakes he wreaks havoc on everything in his path. Avoid this to your best ability, or use it to your advantage. Made by Silver Lewis, JohnLee Cooper, Austin Heller, Lucy Wang, and Chris. A Bear Vegas Game.
